nodes.text: Blue Bespin breakfast bars were a type of breakfast food. The light freighter Millennium Falcon held blue Bespin breakfast bars in its refrigerator unit on at least one occasion; the Weequay pirate Hondo Ohnaka found them alongside blue bantha buttermilk biscuits and blue puff cubes, leading him to wonder if all the foods on the ship were blue.
Blue Bespin breakfast bars first appeared in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
